entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
